text: A custard cream is a type of biscuit which is popular in the United Kingdom. It looks like a biscuit sandwich with a cream center. Like the American Hydrox or Oreo, the custard cream can be eaten by twisting the two biscuits apart and eating the center first. ==Other websites== * Custard cream review from nicecupofteaandasitdown.com Category:Sandwich cookies Category:Desserts
title: Custard cream
